text: nænxn di mi sayyan hnung prakt kæ phwk cea læw sung xyu nı sxng fay thi phechiyhna kan fay hnung txsu nı thang khx ngxallxh læa xik fay hnung pen phu ptiseth sraththa sung hen khea hela nan dwy ta tnxeng pen sxng thea khxng phwk khea læa xallxh nan ca thrng snab snun phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh dwy kar chwyhelux khxng phraxngkh thæcring nı sing thi klaw ma nan yxm pen khx teuxnsti kæ phu mid wng ta thanghlay
